_header: Go little pamphlet and straight thee dress
Title(s): ‘Balade to my gracious Lord of York’
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, ‘Balade to my gracious Lord of York’ — eight 9-line stanzas

HunHM111.First Lines:
Go litil pamfilet and streight thee dresseVn to the noble rootid
                    gentillesse…
HunHM111.Last Lines:
…To his prowesse & hir benigniteeMy lyues ioie it were and
                    sustenance
HunHM111.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.   Hoccleve’s Works: The Minor Poems. vol. 1.  EETS
         e.s. 61 (1892); repr. with Gollancz (1925)
XGollancz,  Israel.

            Mitchell and A. Ian Doyle, 1970: 49-51.
